医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了患有遗传性疾病的儿童的照顾者所面临的挑战当谈到改善患有遗传性疾病的儿童的生活时，医学研究通常只关注儿童。但科罗拉多大学医学系的一位教员强调，还有一个同样重要的人群需要研究：照顾者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-sheds-light-on-challenges-faced-by-caregivers-of-children-with-genic-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-sheds-light-on-challenges-faced-by-caregivers-of-children-with-genic-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdd94e35-a7ce-4e5d-b754-25af69bb1fdf Fri, 10 May 2024 22:15:02 -0400 Study sheds light on challenges faced by caregivers of children with genetic conditions
华盛顿大学研究揭示军用飞机噪音对惠德比岛居民的健康风险鲍勃威尔伯认为他找到了一个宁静的养老院。这座三层楼的房屋坐落在惠德比岛西部边缘的金钟湾畔，周围环绕着树木和海岸线。它提供了只有岛屿才能提供的安静。咆哮者飞行时除外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/UW-study-reveals-health-risks-of-military-aircraft-noise-on-Whidbey-Island-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/UW-study-reveals-health-risks-of-military-aircraft-noise-on-Whidbey-Island-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54230e31-04f5-49c1-9fca-0e982cfca2ac Fri, 10 May 2024 21:57:43 -0400 UW study reveals health risks of military aircraft noise on Whidbey Island residents
国防部授予研究前列腺癌替代聚腺苷酸化的拨款由病理学和实验医学研究助理教授 Eddie Imada 博士领导的团队获得了美国国防部为期三年、价值 150 万美元的资助，用于研究一种称为替代多腺苷酸化的细胞过程及其在前列腺癌中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/DoD-grant-awarded-for-investigating-alternative-polyadenylation-in-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/DoD-grant-awarded-for-investigating-alternative-polyadenylation-in-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32fd8023-c959-4a8a-92ca-762d5b800be2 Fri, 10 May 2024 21:53:21 -0400 DoD grant awarded for investigating alternative polyadenylation in prostate cancer
化疗与患有高风险乳腺癌的老年女性的身体衰退有关加州大学洛杉矶分校 (UCLA) 领导的一项研究表明，65 岁或以上患有高危乳腺癌并接受化疗的女性更有可能出现身体机能大幅下降的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Chemotherapy-linked-to-physical-decline-in-older-women-with-high-risk-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Chemotherapy-linked-to-physical-decline-in-older-women-with-high-risk-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e901a95d-d24a-4fb7-a28c-a0f8f20b33a7 Fri, 10 May 2024 21:47:38 -0400 Chemotherapy linked to physical decline in older women with high-risk breast cancer
探索进化性与物种分化之间的关系自从达尔文发表了关于物种如何进化的具有里程碑意义的理论以来，生物学家一直对使进化成为可能的复杂机制着迷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Exploring-the-relationship- Between-evolvability-and-species-divergence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Exploring-the-relationship- Between-evolvability-and-species-divergence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a23ffccd-7142-4bc1-a6ea-dca67f9eb7fc Fri, 10 May 2024 21:38:03 -0400 Exploring the relationship between evolvability and species divergence
了解大脑如何将感知转化为行动您听到电话铃声或狗叫声。是你的还是别人的？夜里你听到脚步声——；是你的孩子，还是入侵者？是敌是友？您做出的决定将决定您下一步采取的行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Understanding-how-the-brain-processes-perception-into-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Understanding-how-the-brain-processes-perception-into-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfdacd89-771d-4598-ab7e-873fc632d2ea Fri, 10 May 2024 21:32:02 -0400 Understanding how the brain processes perception into action
研究人员发现了一种促进壁细胞发育的“训练计划”消化不良、胃灼热、消化性溃疡、自身免疫性胃炎、胃癌和食道癌等常见病症有一个共同点——它们都会破坏胃壁细胞 (PC) 的正常活动，而胃壁细胞是体内唯一一种会导致胃灼热的细胞。产生酸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Researchers-discover-a-training-program-driven-parietal-cell-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Researchers-discover-a-training-program-driven-parietal-cell-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15ed6808-0e07-4efa-95e1-b6b865b9aba5 Fri, 10 May 2024 21:00:28 -0400 Researchers discover a 'training program' driving parietal cell development
尖镰孢致病性相关 milRNA 的鉴定。 sp。库本塞尖孢镰刀菌 f. sp。 cubense（Foc）是一种典型的土传真菌，它通过侵染香蕉根部、堵塞寄主香蕉维管组织而引起镰刀菌枯萎病，威胁全球香蕉生产。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Identification-of-pathogenicity-linked-milRNAs-in-Fusarium-oxysporum-f-sp-cubense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Identification-of-pathogenicity-linked-milRNAs-in-Fusarium-oxysporum-f-sp-cubense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c762e85-d471-4125-b5c0-31380b43be55 Fri, 10 May 2024 20:55:37 -0400 Identification of pathogenicity-associated milRNAs in Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. cubense
新工具有助于更好地了解和克服儿童营养不良问题弗吉尼亚大学医学院开发的一种新工具将帮助医生和科学家更好地了解和克服儿童营养不良问题，这种营养不良导致了几乎一半的 5 岁以下儿童死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/New-tool-can-help-to-better-understand-and-overcome-childhood-undernutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/New-tool-can-help-to-better-understand-and-overcome-childhood-undernutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcddf312-002c-4273-b061-73f048560319 Fri, 10 May 2024 20:50:42 -0400 New tool can help to better understand and overcome childhood undernutrition
混合选择性的力量：深入了解大脑功能和认知我们的大脑每天都在努力优化一种权衡：我们周围发生了很多事情，尽管我们也拥有许多内部驱动力和记忆，但我们的思想必须灵活但足够集中，以指导我们必须做的一切。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/The-power-of-mixed-selectivity-Insights-into-brain-function-and-cognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/The-power-of-mixed-selectivity-Insights-into-brain-function-and-cognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69c3e1cc-6eae-4ee3-aa20-dff3ea1904c7 Fri, 10 May 2024 20:47:56 -0400 The power of mixed selectivity: Insights into brain function and cognition
